name: Just In Time (Heine)
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 51

Play two characters between two phase who change every 10 seconds. Recolt some coins, build some towers, protect your home !

Basics :

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Action

Credits for assets :

- 0x72 (characters)

- Game Endeavor (Tileset)

- Kronbits (Sfx)

- Darkworld Audio (Sfx)

- escalonamusic.com (music)

( if i forgot someone, tell me ! )
